description: This file defines API routes for managing user notifications, including listing, creating, marking as read, deleting notifications, and handling WebSocket connections for real-time notification delivery.

methods.name: list_notifications( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), is_read: Optional[bool] = Query(default=None, description="Filter by read status"), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list notifications for the current user with optional filtering by read status.

methods.name: create_notification( payload: NotificationCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new notification for the current user and attempts to send it via WebSocket.

methods.name: mark_as_read( notification_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to mark a specific notification as read.

methods.name: delete_notification( notification_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a specific notification.

methods.name: notifications_ws(websocket: WebSocket)
methods.description: WebSocket endpoint for establishing real-time notification streams for authenticated users.

ctags.name: create_notification
ctags.signature: ( payload: NotificationCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: delete_notification
ctags.signature: ( notification_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: list_notifications
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), is_read: Optional[bool] = Query(default=None, description="Filter by read status"), )

ctags.name: mark_as_read
ctags.signature: ( notification_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
